name: Granny's Calami-Tea
description:
Granny's Calami-Tea

For a 72h game jam we created a small arcade-like game. We were given the theme fragile and came up with 'Grandma's Calami-Tea'. Working on this game was an amazing experience and a challenge, as we were a rather small team without any developers. We are very proud of the result and we hope you enjoy our cute game! 

You are playing as a tea cup and the goal is to catch as many jumping tea bags from the shelf on the wall. Be aware you're not the only magical animated household object in this house. A teacup is very fragile and you don't want a fluffy paw or a falling cat toy smashing you to bits! You only have 3 lives after all!!!!

Tech Artists

Felicia Larsson: game design, blue printing and FX

https://www.artstation.com/felicialarsson

Franka Vleeshouwers: game design and  blue printing

https://www.artstation.com/frankavleeshouwers

https://www.artstation.com/dayellcolin

Yanouk Verleysen: concept, modelling and animation https://www.artstation.com/yanoukverleysen

Eva Rübl: modelling, illustration and UI
